Source: InvestmentPitch.com

Description: Ashton Addison speaks with Steven Boykey Sidley, Author of Beyond Bitcoin: Decentralized Finance and the End of Banks, on the release of their Book, the transition of Banks into Decentralized Finance, an overview of the top DeFi Protocols, and where to get their book on Amazon and in stores.Learn more: https://www.amazon.com/Beyond-Bitcoin-Decentralized-Finance-Banks/dp/1785788302
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3I6QMMq
